data.title: Arthur C. Clarke; Gentry Lee Book List
data.meta_description: A complete list of all Arthur C. Clarke; Gentry Lee's books in order (4 books). Browse plot descriptions, book covers, genres, pseudonyms, ratings and awards.
data.text:
Cradle

Aug-1988

/ Science Fiction

Arthur C. Clarke brings his thrilling, eerie vision to a spine-tingling modern adventure that ranges from the unguessable past to the edge of tomorrow, from the vast ocean of stars to the bottom of the sea. For here, something powerful waits to awake...

Rama II

Dec-1989

/ Science Fiction

THE RAMANS ARE BACK... -- Years ago, the enormous, enigmatic alien spacecraft called Rama sailed through our solar system as mind-boggling proof that life existed--or had existed--elsewhere in the universe. Now, at the dawn of the twenty-third cen...

The Garden of Rama

Sep-1991

/ Science Fiction

By the twenty-third century Earth has already had two encounters with massive, mysterious robotic spacecraft from beyond our solar system--the incontestable proof of an alien technology that far exceeds our own. Now three human cosmonauts are trapped...

Rama Revealed

Mar-1994

/ Science Fiction

THE CONCLUSION TO ONE OF THE MOST HERALDED SCIENCE FICTION SERIES OF ALL TIME! On its mysterious voyage through deep space, a massive, alien starship carries its passengers to the end of a generations-long odyssey. The great experiment has failed,...
